So $LTC may add confidential transactions. Increases block size by a fair bit. Their 8x capacity over $BTC will dwindle. Why not just use $XMR then, private by default? Nice they're finally looking at improvements though, 7.5 years of nothing but adding SegWit after $DGB did...😶

Litecoin to add Confidential Transactions via softfork.  Interesting announcement. I'm glad that a "bitcoin-like" project is implementing CTs first so we can see the tradeoffs (and possible unforeseen consequences) in the wild.
